topics.body:
Hey guys I'm just curious but have any of you tried to do a read and response typing challenge? It's rather fast paced, mostly requiring you to have good hand to eye coordination, and so forth. 

I used to do this back at my high school for our IT classes, real pain in the neck when everyone's typing out rhymes and crap, that gets really confusing. Worst one I think someone typed out Shakespeare and made us try and out write him.
topics.author: 5046d66d7f123b38980018c6

topics.body:
Ladies and gentleman police have issued an APB for caucasian male, brown hair, brown eyes 29 to 37 feet tall. Answers to the name Moro the Malignant.

Suspect was last scene in the vicinity of St. George park, asking small children riddles eating those unable to answer and giving gold coins to those that could. It is not known at this time if the gold coins carry a blessing of wit and luck for all the child's days or if they are in fact just giant currency.

If spotted follow but do not engage, suspect is invulnerable to all conventional weapons. Instead be on the look out for a hispanic female age 13 to 17 that is pure of heart and free of spirit, according to our wizard she is the only one who can free the magic sword from the scabbard and slay the giant.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
